title: "Goodie Bag" video blog on Trajan
content:
It looks like mainstream folks are starting to notice that Trajan is overused on movie posters and titles. Check this out:

[http://www.goodiebag.tv/episodes/06\_trajan\_is\_the\_movie\_font.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021232444/http:/www.goodiebag.tv/episodes/06_trajan_is_the_movie_font.htm "http://www.goodiebag.tv/episodes/06\_trajan\_is\_the\_movie\_font.htm")

Of course this is no surprise to anyone here. [Typophiles](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021232444/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37478) have [been all over](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021232444/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29098) the [Trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021232444/http:/www.veer.com/ideas/etched/) issue [for years](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021232444/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2609).
author: smarks
